objqq15@chess.name: objQQ15
objqq15@chess.desc[0]: A Joker's cap is crumpled up on the floor here

mirror_a@chess.name: mirror_a
mirror_a@chess.examine:
The mirror is full of smoke!  As you gaze upon it, a face comes
into focus.  It appears to be a crazily laughing man dressed in
bright clashing clothes.  He looks into your eyes and points downward.
'Come visit me, dearie..', he says with a cackle.
The image abruptly fades...

tile_chessqq58@chess.examine:
You know why it's called the Lost Chamber?  Because everyone who got
in here have been lost...forever.  You hear echos of cackling.

down_chessqq04@chess.name: down_chessQQ04
down_chessqq04@chess.examine: You're gonna find out fast- cuz thats the way your sliding!

chessqq46@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq46@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq41@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq41@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq04@chess.title: Down..Down..Down..
chessqq04@chess.description:
Your descent picks up speed, and you trip over an unseen obstacle
in the stairway!  As you tumble, the stairs start to become narrower and
then begin to slope forward.  You soon find yourself sliding in circles &+Cdown
the tunnel, which has now become smooth stone, covered with very fine sand.
You faintly detect the sound of delighted laughter echoing in some faraway
place.

chessqq34@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq34@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq56@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq56@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq35@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq35@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq24@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq24@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq81@chess.title: The Dock
chessqq81@chess.description:
As you step onto the dock, it sags crazily and settles more
firmly into the river.  A sudden bright light shines out from upriver,
blinding you momentarily.  The light approaches closer, and you realize
that it is some strange form of boat.  It stops at the north side of the
dock, ready to be boarded.

chessqq73@chess.title: The Joker's Teacup
chessqq73@chess.description: You are sliding around in a highly polished porcelain cup.

chessqq53@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq53@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq57@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq43@chess.description:

chessqq54@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq36@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq36@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq86@chess.title: The Entrance Hall
chessqq86@chess.description:
You find yourself standing at the beginning of a giant entrance 
hall.  A fine red carpet leads north, and extravagant silks line the 
walls.

chessqq65@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq65@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq62@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq62@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq80@chess.title: The Dock
chessqq80@chess.description:
As you step onto the dock, it sags crazily and settles more 
firmly into the river.  A sudden bright light shines out from upriver, 
blinding you momentarily.  The light approaches closer, and you realize  
that it is some strange form of boat.  It stops at the north side of the
dock, ready to be boarded.

chessqq75@chess.title: The Joker's Teacup
chessqq75@chess.description: You are sliding around in a highly polished porcelain cup.

chessqq83@chess.title: The Underground River
chessqq83@chess.description:
You bob along lazily in the strange craft, spinning in complete 
circles at points, but always headed downstream.  In the distance you see 
another dock.

chessqq38@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq38@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq10@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq10@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq74@chess.title: The Joker's Teacup
chessqq74@chess.description: You are sliding around in a highly polished porcelain cup.

chessqq79@chess.title: The Landing
chessqq79@chess.description:
You drop down from the &+ytrapdoor&*, and land on soft dirt.  You
seem to be inside some sort of enclave, and you see an underground river
to the west.  There is a small wooden &+ydock&* extending from your enclave
out into the river.

chessqq32@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq32@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq51@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq51@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq49@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq49@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq02@chess.title: The Furnished Chamber
chessqq02@chess.description:
This chamber is furnished quite nicely, with a thick woven 
rug beneath your feet, and tapestries along the walls.  There is a
rectangular hole in the rug, revealing a &+Ctrapdoor&* which seems to open
via a small iron ring, The room's exit looms behind you.

chessqq33@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq33@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

extends about six feet in either direction.

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq18@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq42@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq42@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq11@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq23@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq26@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq26@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq08@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq08@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq12@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq12@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq50@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq50@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq84@chess.title: Arrival
chessqq84@chess.description:
The Sulking Swan heads directly to its berth, lining up alongside 
the wooden platform.  Ropes move of their own accord, rising from the 
pilings and intertwining themselves with the boat's brass brackets.  It 
seems safe to step east onto the second dock, or you could just sit here 
and keep the boat company.

chessqq21@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq21@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq66@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq66@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq85@chess.title: The Second Dock
chessqq85@chess.description:
You decide that this dock is much sturdier than the first, and it 
feels quite nice to stand on firm ground again.  The boat is tied to the 
west, and a nice red wooden door waits expectantly at the east end of the 
dock- it seems to lead directly into the tunnel wall.

chessqq13@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq13@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq29@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq29@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq00@chess.title: The Stone Door
chessqq00@chess.description:
You find yourself standing in a dry circular room which is
illuminated by a small brass torch set in the wall.  Flickering
shadows dance about the room in a manner you find disorienting.          
Beneath the torch is an elaborate mahogany door, complete with a small 
silver doorknob.

chessqq06@chess.title: The Ledge
chessqq06@chess.description:
You pop out of the slide, sail through the air for several long
moments, crash into the side of a cavern, and land on a ledge in a
crumpled heap.  You slowly look upwards, and what you see astounds even you-
a seasoned adventurer.  You are in the north end of a perfectly square 
cavern with a floor composed of sixty-four alternating black and white 
marble tiles.  Giant torches line the walls, casting a dazzling glow over 
the entire room.  Standing guard over half the squares are giant carved 
wooden beings, looming and silent.  There is a neat wooden &+yladder&* beneath 
you, leading downward, and three quarters up the opposite wall is the 
small hole you just came flying out of.

chessqq61@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq61@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq71@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq71@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq05@chess.title: The Slide
chessqq05@chess.description:
You come out of the last spin, and are abruptly deposited on a
slide made of some slick metal.  You descend rapidy, being abruptly slammed
against the walls as the slide banks through several tight corners.  Ahead
of you, approaching rapidly is a small point of &+Ylight.

chessqq07@chess.title: The Ladder
chessqq07@chess.description:
You are on a simple wooden ladder, which has been bolted by means
of small metal hooks to the cavern wall.  The &+yledge&* is above you, and the
cavern &+Cfloor&* is below you.  There is a small &+Csign&* on the wall.

chessqq67@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq67@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq40@chess.title: The Black Square

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq27@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq44@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq44@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq87@chess.title: The Entrance Hall
chessqq87@chess.description:
You are standing on a fine red carpet, halfway down the length of 
the entrance hall.  There is retreat to the south, and a giant throne to 
the north.

chessqq58@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq58@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq09@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq09@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which 
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq76@chess.title: The Black Queen's Chamber
chessqq76@chess.description:
You are in a small chamber, containing only a &+Cbed&*, basin,
mirror and braided rug.  Despite being very small, it looks comfortable 
enough to rest in for a bit.  As you seat yourself on the bed, you see a 
flicker of motion in the &+Cmirror..

chessqq22@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq22@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq19@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq03@chess.title: The Stone Staircase
chessqq03@chess.description:
You find yourself in a rough stone &+Cstaircase&*, which winds around
a smooth core of stone, descending deeper into the bowels of the earth.
Small torches are set into the stone, guiding your way.

chessqq72@chess.title: The Lost Chamber
chessqq72@chess.description:
This chamber is small, dark, and cramped.  You begin to
feel a bit claustrophobic.  That &+Ctrapdoor&* looks far out of reach!

chessqq77@chess.title: The White Queen's Chamber
chessqq77@chess.description:
You are in a small chamber, containing only a &+Cbed&*, basin,
mirror and braided rug.  Despite being very small, it looks comfortable
enough to rest in for a bit.  As you seat yourself on the bed, you see a
flicker of motion in the &+Cmirror..

chessqq17@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq63@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq88@chess.title: The Joker's Throne
chessqq88@chess.description:
You stand before a giant &+Ythrone&*, made entirely of fool's gold.  
This seems to be the domain of the Joker- It may be wise to leave him to 
his games...

chessqq78@chess.title: The Landing
chessqq78@chess.description:
You drop down from the &+ytrapdoor&*, and land on soft dirt.  You 
seem to be inside some sort of enclave, and you see an underground river 
to the east.  There is a small wooden &+ydock&* extending from your enclave 
out into the river.

chessqq39@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq39@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq16@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq16@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq01@chess.title: The Smooth Tunnel
chessqq01@chess.description:
Looking down at your feet, you are somewhat surprised to find that you 
are walking on a thick woven rug. The walls of the tunnel that you are in 
are completely smooth, and polished to a gleam. Before you, the tunnel opens 
up to what appears to be a small &+Cchamber.

chessqq55@chess.title: The White Square
chessqq55@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished white marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq70@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq70@chess.description:
You are standing on a highly polished black marble tile, which
extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq64@chess.title: The Black Square
chessqq64@chess.description:

extends about six feet in either direction.

chessqq82@chess.title: The Sulking Swan
chessqq82@chess.description:
The sulking swan is a large wooden craft, carved to the exact 
likeness of a swan.  Its wooden sides thump hollowly against the tunnel 
sides, as it bobs gently and begins to carry you downstream.

mobqq02_3@chess.name: mobQQ02_3
mobqq02_3@chess.examine:
The pawn seems to be made of carved wood, and animated by 
some magical means.
mobqq02_3@chess.description: A White Pawn shuffles around nervously here.

mobqq03_1@chess.name: mobQQ03_1
mobqq03_1@chess.examine:
The black Rook stares absently into space, he doesn't seem
to notice you.
mobqq03_1@chess.description: A black Rook stands here, having linear thoughts.

mobqq07_1@chess.name: mobQQ07_1
mobqq07_1@chess.examine: The bishop looks at you, then stares at the ceiling and yawns.
mobqq07_1@chess.description: A black bishop stands here quietly.

mobqq06@chess.name: mobQQ06
mobqq06@chess.examine:
The white Knight would probably look alot more noble if
he was astride a horse.
mobqq06@chess.description: A white knight is here, looking for his horse.

mobqq16@chess.name: mobQQ16
mobqq16@chess.examine:
The playing card grins at you evilly.
He is of the suit clubs.
mobqq16@chess.description: A playing card shuffles around here.
mobqq16@chess.pname: a card of the suit clubs

mobqq12@chess.name: mobQQ12
mobqq12@chess.examine:
The white King looks rather haggard.  He tells you,
'Take my wife...pleeeaase.'  You decide that the king
is not much of a comedian.
mobqq12@chess.description: A white King stands here, looking grumpy.

mobqq00@chess.name: mobQQ00
mobqq00@chess.examine:
The troll is small, dark, and smelly.  You would be willing
to bet that he has never seen the light of day.
mobqq00@chess.description: A tunnel troll wanders about here.

mobqq10@chess.name: mobQQ10
mobqq10@chess.examine:

the floor, you nitwit!'
mobqq10@chess.description: The white Queen stands here, blocking a door.

checker@chess.name: checker
checker@chess.examine: It seems someone wanted to play checkers instead, and this piece got lost.
checker@chess.description: A red checker piece is here...on a chessboard?!?

mobqq18@chess.name: mobQQ18
mobqq18@chess.examine:
The Joker cackles happily and ruffles your hair.
'So nice to see you dearie, would you like some tea?'
The Joker is NUTS!
mobqq18@chess.description: The Joker bounces around, happy to see you.
